content: with the different stitch section you ll love this sampler style crochet blanket and want to just keep going to make it to the next section 11 sizes included from lovey to california king this blanket took a full year to make it from start to finish and i ve shared the journey in my blog post 1 but it s brought me present day where i ve decided based on request to share this as a crochet a long **crochet a long details ** in person we re going to be working on this sample style crocheted blanket together if you are local to central florida we d love for you to join us starting sunday august 3rd in melbourne or tuesday august 5th in tavares you can find the exact schedule over on my yarn crafts & coffee shop events page 2 to go hand and hand with the in person crochet a long i ll be updating my blog post with the new sections and video tutorials as they become available so i highly recommend joining my newsletter list 3 so you ll find out as soon as the updates are ready or grabbing the pdf here on ravelry where i ll also be sending out updates but this is my tentative schedule 1st section posted | 2nd section posted | 3rd section posted | 4th section september 16th | 5th section september 30th | 6th section october 14th | 7th section october 28th **prefer video tutorials ** - h8/5mm crochet hook - tapestry needle **material notes ** feel free to substitute the pound of love for your favorite worsted weight yarn if the finished size is essential to you then check your gauge but if not then just start crocheting i used lion brand pound of love in the denim colorway for the video and a couple other designs currently in progress the original blanket from the cover photo was worked in lion brand wool ease **time spent ** working the toddler/child size i completed the half_double_crochet section in about 3 and a half hours and the textured section in about 4 and a half hours **total measurements with border width by height ** note the height is currently estimated until i get a couple more sections graded -
